==============
myFusionWallet
==============


A full functionion `wallet <https://github.com/FUSIONFoundation/myfusionwallet>`_ with asset creation, time locks, and quantum swaps.

You can see it live in action at: `https://www.myfusionwallet.com <https://www.myfusionwallet.com>`_.

And the source can be found on github at: `https://github.com/FUSIONFoundation/myfusionwallet <https://github.com/FUSIONFoundation/myfusionwallet>`_.
